EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Downloading. Now Let's Party.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
ACTIVATE YOUR LICENSE & OWN YOUR ENVIRONMENT Get Activation Key: <http://bit.ly/1o95lOP>
You've just downloaded the world's most advanced virtualization management software, VMTurbo Operations Manager. You're on your way to ramping-up VM density and achieving previously impossible utilization rates, all while assuring application performance like never before. Think your environment is too complex? VMTurbo thrives on complexity.
- Start by deploying the self-contained instance. Your username and password is "administrator". Our Installation Video <http://vmturbo.com/resources/videos-main/#Installation & Setup?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=trialnurture> will usher you straight to the promised land. - Snag your License Key <http://go.vmturbo.com/new-cloud-edition-license.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=trialnurture>, or as we like to call it, the “Life before VMTurbo was so much worse” key.
You're also invited to join The Green Circle Community <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm1> - VMTurbo's online community of innovators, virtualization experts, and forward-thinking IT pros. Enjoy.
Life is about the change. CapEx and OpEx are going down, along with your frustrations. Like we said, you’re a genius. It’s time to own your environment.
Looking forward to your success, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
Copyright © 2014 VMTurbo, Inc. All rights reserved. <http://www.facebook.com/vmturbo1> <http://www.twitter.com/VMTurbo> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/248491>
